summary: Applies nucleus (top‑p) filtering to a Flax logits tensor, retaining the smallest set of highest‑probability tokens whose cumulative probability meets or exceeds a given cutoff and setting all other logits to a specified filter value, while ensuring at least a minimum number of tokens remain unfiltered.
business_intent: To provide controlled, diverse token sampling for Flax‑based language model generation by limiting the probability distribution to the most likely tokens up to a configurable probability mass.
